name: Grow Apart
description:
Battle your friends for the ultimate highest tree in this local multiplayer game. Each player must use the acorns to grow their tree higher and higher to try and reach the goal first.

Gamepad controls (recommended):
Left joystick - Move
A - Jump
B - tap to pickup/drop/punch, hold to use item

Keyboard controls:
wasd / arrow keys - move & jump
Left shift / Right shift - tap to pickup/drop/punch, hold to use item

Made in less than 48 hours in the Global Game Jam 2023
Art by Ido Leshem
Programming by Danny Marcowitz & Dor Nevo
Music & Sound by Ilai Schwebel
